review: I do like the convenience. I have an Apple tv in the other room, and I'd have to say the Fire Stick remote and function is not as intuitive as the Apple tv. I was also a bit disappointed to find out some programming is only available to Android users. I have an HBO Go subscription but it's only accessible for those using an Android phone. I have an iPhone. Oh well. The Fire Stick is a nice bit of technology and a fun toy to have. I still give it 4 stars. Good job.
